caption:
Hold tight to any terrain. Powered by Vibram® Megagrip with multi-directional lugs and LiteBase technology, the Mafate Speed 4 Lite STSFY offers relentless traction on wet and dry surfaces. The streamlined outsole keeps weight low while maximizing grip and stability across rugged landscapes. Designed for ultimate control and confidence, wherever the trail takes you.

Dropping in Bone on November 14th at satisfyrunning.com and on November 15th at hoka.com and select global retailers. Sign up to our newsletter via the link in bio to be the first to grab your pair.
